tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE user_data (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50), encrypted_email VARCHAR(100), encrypted_password VARCHAR(100))

CREATE TABLE user_personal_info (
    id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    full_name VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL,
    address VARCHAR NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE user_payment_info (
    id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    credit_card_number VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    cvv VARBINARY NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE user_profile (
    user_id INT,
    first_name VARCHAR(255),
    last_name VARCHAR(255),
    address TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
);

CREATE TABLE credit_cards (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    card_number VARCHAR(16),
    expiration_date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
);

CREATE TABLE sensitive_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    data_type VARCHAR(255),
    encrypted_data TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
);

CREATE TABLE login_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    login_time TIMESTAMP,
    logout_time TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
);
